United 'trying to rush through Sergej Milinkovic-Savic deal'
With just three days to go until the window closes United are trying to rush through a £138million move for Lazio midfielder Sergej Milinkovic-Savic according to reports.

Italian outlet Calciomercato, claim United are competing against Juventus and Real Madrid to land the Serbian.

Juventus and Real still have weeks left until the end of their transfer windows but United will have to rush through a deal for the Serbia international as the transfer window here closes on Thursday at 5pm.
